Janky Koboldzilla.name: Janky Koboldzilla
Janky Koboldzilla.description:
While some kobolds are blessed with sorcery bequeathed to them by their draconic origins, others possess the ability to believe so fervently that their beliefs manifest. Baron Bodrum has seized upon this untapped form of magic to improve the profits on his ‘Buddy Bots’ line of automatons. Kobold belief has cut costs by over sixty percent, and designs are in the works for constructs that contain no magical components. Of course, the Kobold Resources department is under strict orders to keep this under wraps lest it make the kobolds begin to doubt their work.

Paradox of Gullibility. This brings us to a paradox. Kobolds are pretty gullible, and will believe almost anything if enough big words and shinies are used. But, if enough of them start believing a lie, the lie can come true. Who’s the gullible one then!? On returning from a month in the cramped kobold caves, Dr. Doolots posited that this belief-manifest is a defence mechanism evolved in response to other creatures’ desire to abuse kobold gullibility.

Koboldzilla

This machine should not function. Every rivet, bolt, and staple that holds the koboldzilla together is brimming with belief. The metal ignores its maximum shearing load, the wood forgets that it should spontaneously combust, and gravity forms an anomaly around its ridiculously armoured carapace.

Burgeoning Sentience. Before it becomes godlike, the koboldzilla is aware. It causes armour plating to come loose in the nick of time to protect its kobold pilots, and its growing will causes objects for miles around to begin working again with the most rudimentary percussive maintenance. With the belief that only martyrdom can bequest, the koboldzilla is a hair’s breadth from apotheososis.

Apotheosis.name: Apotheosis
Apotheosis.description: If the koboldzilla would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to [[lookup @attributes.hp.max]] hit points, it recharges its Dragon Breath, its Dexterity increases to 27 (+8), and its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma increase to 16 (+3). Takeoff.name: Takeoff
Takeoff.description:
The koboldzilla upregulates its arcanothermic engine. Each creature within 15 feet of the koboldzilla must succeed on a [[/save activity=dnd5eactivity000 format=long]] or take [[/damage activity=dnd5eactivity000 average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The koboldzilla can then fly up to 60 feet and begin to hover.

At the end of the next turn, the koboldzilla lands. Each creature in the space where the koboldzilla lands must make a [[/save activity=NfM3dsSyMfo7rxmM format=long]]. On a failed save, a creature takes [[/damage activity=NfM3dsSyMfo7rxmM average]] damage and is knocked &Reference[prone] and &Reference[restrained] until the koboldzilla moves out of the creature’s space. Alternatively, the creature can use an action to make a [[/check dc=@abilities.con.dc athletics]] check, exiting &Reference[prone] in the nearest unoccupied space on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage, is not knocked prone, and moves to the nearest unoccupied space.

Each creature within 10 feet of the turret (including the turret) must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage as shards of metal shoot outwards. The turret automatically fails this saving throw.

If the target is a Small or smaller creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[Prone].

Mechakobold.name: Mechakobold
Mechakobold.description:
Foundry Note: Assign the mechakobold's Challenge Rating (CR) to your Tamer level for the correct proficiency bonus.

Mechakobold

This little friend is sehr helpful. Sometimes too helpful. Von time, vhen I vas harvestink ein red dragon’s breath sak, I asked for a scalpel und it dropped it. Point down. Into ze sak. My hair’s only just grown back.

— Humperdink, Recently Signed

Type: Construct

Creature Component: Koboldzilla

Bonus Tamer Improvement: @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-mecha-koboldzilla.Item.v2LYJkirgMPeyZ3n]{Pack Tactics} and +2 Hit Dice

From the crude blood-oil of the mecha koboldzilla can be harnessed the progenitor genetic code of the modern kobold. A combination of flesh and metal, the mechakobold retains much of the modern kobold’s ingenuity and penchant for mischief. Mechakobolds’ belief powers their magical inventions; the force of their personality directly augments their creations. Expect homemade explosions, picked pockets, and the pressing of any big, red buttons.

If any of the mechakobold's traits or actions require saving throws, it is always against the mechakobold's save DC, as calculated below.

Save DC = 8 + the tamer’s proficiency bonus + the mechakobold's Charisma modifier

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the mechakobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Tie Laces.description: The mechakobold attempts to tie together the lower limbs of a creature within 5 feet of it using a pair of spare laces. On a success, the target’s walking and climbing speeds are halved until it unties its laces as an action, or cuts them with an attack with a slashing weapon.

Siege Monster.description: The koboldzilla deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The koboldzilla makes two attacks: one with its Gazebo Smash and one with its Tail.

Rustable.name: Rustable
Rustable.description: If the koboldzilla takes 20 or more acid damage in a single turn, it becomes &Reference[restrained] until the end of its next turn.

Gazebo Smash.name: Gazebo Smash
Gazebo Smash.description:
[[/attack format=extended]]. [[/damage format=extended]].

The koboldzilla attacks with its smash.

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description:
[[/attack format=extended]]. [[/damage format=extended]].

The koboldzilla attacks with its tail.

Legendary Resistance (3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Legendary Resistance (3/Day).description: If the koboldzilla fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Dragon Breath (Recharge 5-6).name: Dragon Breath (Recharge 5-6)
Dragon Breath (Recharge 5-6).description: The koboldzilla exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Constructed Weakness.name: Constructed Weakness
Constructed Weakness.description: The koboldzilla has the following flaws: Arcanothermic Engine. If the koboldzilla takes 20 or more cold damage in a single turn, it can’t recharge its Dragon Breath action until the end of its next turn.

Mythic Actions.name: Mythic Actions
Mythic Actions.description:
If the koboldzilla’s Apotheosis trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors-heliana-mecha-koboldzilla.Actor.y91igH7u4EPPxocX.Item.FrPrtAuKZmy53qJh]{Takeoff}.

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors-heliana-mecha-koboldzilla.Actor.y91igH7u4EPPxocX.Item.cHJIIhKwafGzpcfd]{Arcanothermic Overcharge} (Costs 2 Actions).

Apotheosis.name: Apotheosis
Apotheosis.description: If the koboldzilla would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to [[lookup @attributes.hp.max]] hit points, it recharges its Dragon Breath, its Dexterity increases to 27 (+8), and its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma increase to 18 (+4). Additionally, all kobold pilots are incinerated in the process, it can’t use its Koboldapult legendary action until it finishes a short or long rest, and the koboldzilla can use the options in the “Mythic Actions” section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 8,400 XP (16,800 XP total) for defeating the koboldzilla after its Apotheosis activates.

Loose Plating.name: Loose Plating
Loose Plating.description: When the koboldzilla is reduced to 165 hit points or fewer for the first time since it last finished a long rest, it loses some of its armour plating. Its AC is reduced to 19, its walking speed is doubled, and its Dexterity increases to 20 (+5). These effects last until it finishes a long rest.

Legendary Actions.name: Legendary Actions
Legendary Actions.description:
The koboldzilla can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The koboldzilla regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors-heliana-mecha-koboldzilla.Actor.y91igH7u4EPPxocX.Item.9myQTq5P3ki3KF0Q]{Tail Attack}.

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors-heliana-mecha-koboldzilla.Actor.y91igH7u4EPPxocX.Item.efpSiY4TJQE5BxzZ]{Koboldapult} (Costs 2 Actions).

Tail Attack.name: 扫尾攻击
Tail Attack.description:
[[/attack format=extended]]. [[/damage format=extended]].

The koboldzilla attacks with its tail.

Takeoff.name: Takeoff
Takeoff.description:
The koboldzilla upregulates its arcanothermic engine. Each creature within 15 feet of the koboldzilla must succeed on a [[/save activity=dnd5eactivity000 format=long]] or take [[/damage activity=dnd5eactivity000 average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The koboldzilla can then fly up to 60 feet and begin to hover.

At the end of the next turn, the koboldzilla lands. Each creature in the space where the koboldzilla lands must make a [[/save activity=NfM3dsSyMfo7rxmM format=long]]. On a failed save, a creature takes [[/damage activity=NfM3dsSyMfo7rxmM average]] damage and is knocked &Reference[prone] and &Reference[restrained] until the koboldzilla moves out of the creature’s space. Alternatively, the creature can use an action to make a [[/check dc=@abilities.con.dc athletics]] check, exiting &Reference[prone] in the nearest unoccupied space on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage, is not knocked prone, and moves to the nearest unoccupied space.

The koboldzilla upregulates its arcanothermic engine, make a Dexterity saving throw!

Arcanothermic Overcharge (Costs 2 Action.name: Arcanothermic Overcharge (Costs 2 Actions)
Arcanothermic Overcharge (Costs 2 Action.description: The koboldzilla recharges and uses its Dragon Breath.

Koboldapult (Costs 2 Actions).name: Koboldapult (Costs 2 Actions)
Koboldapult (Costs 2 Actions).description:
The koboldzilla fires a cluster of kobolds at a point within 120 feet of the koboldzilla. Each creature within 20 feet of that point must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. Additionally, 3 ([[/r 1d4+1]]) @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors-heliana-mecha-koboldzilla.Actor.0isKHxst5nfwa6Ql]{Kobold} survive this ordeal, and land prone in unoccupied spaces within the area. These @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors-heliana-mecha-koboldzilla.Actor.0isKHxst5nfwa6Ql]{Kobold} act on initiative count 1.

The koboldzilla uses koboldapult, make a Dexterity saving throw!
